subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The Spanish club got a pair of goals each from Gareth Bale, Cristiano Ronaldo and Karim Benzema as it destroyed Schalke, 6-1.
snippet: The Spanish club got a pair of goals each from Gareth Bale, Cristiano Ronaldo and Karim Benzema as it destroyed Schalke, 6-1.
